comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the amount invested in condos and y be the amount invested in detached houses, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x + y \leq 760000",
        "0.2x \leq x",
        "y \geq 20000",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 0.5x + y"
}
